name: FIN_ASST_TRKR_RST_GUAR_HX
description: This table contains a history of edits made to the list of guarantor restrictions placed on a financial assistance tracker to limit the scope of tracker's approval.

columns.name: FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the financial assistance program tracker record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the guarantors approval is restricted to at the time of this update in the financial assistance tracker record. Together with FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID column in this table, this forms the foreign key to the FIN_ASST_TRKR_UPDATE_HX table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple guarantor records approval is restricted to with the financial assistance tracker and the update  from the FIN_ASST_TRKR_UPDATE_HX table.

columns.name: UPDATE_RSTR_ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of one of the guarantor records the tracker's approval is restricted to at the time of update.
